name: Ironhack's Airbnb App Clone
description:
Ironhack Workshop #2 - Components & Prototyping

In this file, you will find a challenge to complete some flow on Airbnb's app. Follow the instructions and design the missing screens using Components. 

The focus of this workshop is that you use components to improve your workflow and spend more time on design. Besides, we'll show you how to create three main interactions: vertical scrolling, horizontal scrolling, and panning using Figma Frames. 

As a result of the workshop, you'll have created a complete "happy path" flow for trendy 2020's Airbnb ^^
